•••NetStartz Web Services ( http://www.netstartz.com ) is having a killer Mid-Summer Special.•••

Our new website is complete and we are now having a major special to celebrate the launch of our new site. This special is for this WEEK only so act fast as their will be no exceptions. This is one deal you can’t afford to miss out on…

Reseller Deals...
Click Here to view our normal reseller plans...
View Our Reseller Features

Now Here is the deal...If we receive your order before midnight est. July 19th 2003 you will automatically be upgraded to the next plan up for the same pricing as the plan you order. Soo...

We would also like to try offering Semi-Dedicated plans to see if we should continue to offer them when we launch the new version of our site. The following plans are also available for this special...if you are interested please feel free to contact me as these are not listed on our site. The prices are highly negotiable. Here at NetStartz Web Services we pride ourselves on offering the best quality service and support. We provide guaranteed 24/7 support to all our customers. Unlike many hosts we provide you with many different methods of contacting us...All that information is given in the welcome email.
  • 24/7 Help Desk/Tickets
  • Live IM Support AIM/ICQ/YHOO/MSN
  • Live Irc Support

Feel free to contact me via any method listed in my profile if you have any questions.

Have A Great Day!!!


Best Regards,
